fun.bigThreeDominance: Fun Fact: BTS, Blackpink and Twice combined account for {{bigThreeViews}} YouTube views, or {{proportion}}%!
fun.birthday: Fun Fact: {{name}}'s birthday is this month on {{formattedDate}}!
fun.companyByArtistCount: Fun Fact: {{company}} is the entertainment company with the {{ordinalNum}} most artists (including subunits and solo debuts) at {{num}} total!
fun.companyByArtistViews: Fun Fact: {{name}} is the {{ordinalNum}} most viewed entertainment company with {{views}} total YouTube views!
fun.historicalCircleDigitalWeekly: Fun Fact: On this week in {{year}}, {{songName}} was the top charting song on the Circle Digital Weekly charts!
fun.mostActiveYear: Fun Fact: {{year}} was the {{ordinalNum}} most active year in K-Pop with {{num}} music video releases!
fun.mostAnnualAwardShowWins: Fun Fact: {{artistName}} has the {{ordinalNum}} most annual award show wins with {{wins}}!
fun.mostCircleDigitalAppearances: Fun Fact: {{artistName}} has placed on the Circle Digital weekly charts the {{ordinalNum}} most times with {{appearances}} appearances!
fun.mostCircleDigitalFirsts: Fun Fact: {{artistName}} has topped the Circle Digital weekly charts the {{ordinalNum}} most times with {{firstPlaceCount}} first place appearances!
fun.mostDebuts: Fun Fact: {{year}} had the {{ordinalNum}} most debuts with {{num}} groups debuting!
fun.mostLikedGroup: Fun Fact: {{artist}} is the {{ordinalNum}} most liked group with {{likes}} total YouTube likes!
fun.mostLikedVideo: Fun Fact: {{hyperlink}} is the {{ordinalNum}} most liked video with {{likes}} total YouTube likes!
fun.mostMVs: Fun Fact: {{artist}} has the {{ordinalNum}} most music videos with {{num}} on YouTube!
fun.mostMusicShowWins: Fun Fact: {{artist}} has won the {{ordinalNum}} most music shows with {{num}} wins!
fun.mostViewedGroup: Fun Fact: {{artist}} is the {{ordinalNum}} most viewed group with {{views}} total YouTube views!
fun.mostViewedSoloist: Fun Fact: {{artist}} is the {{ordinalNum}} most viewed solo artist with {{views}} total YouTube views!
fun.mostViewedVideo: Fun Fact: {{hyperlink}} is the {{ordinalNum}} most viewed video with {{views}} total YouTube views!
fun.mvViewMilestone: Fun Fact: {{hyperlink}} recently reached {{views}} views on YouTube!
fun.newMV: New Song Alert: Check out this recently released music video, {{hyperlink}}
fun.oldMV: Fun Fact: {{hyperlink}} was released this week back in {{year}}!
fun.recentCircleDigitalWeekly: Fun Fact: {{songName}} is the {{ordinalNum}} highest charting song on the Circle Digital Weekly charts last week!
fun.recentMusicShowWin: Fun Fact: {{hyperlink}} recently won on {{musicShow}} on {{winDate}}
fun.recentPak: Fun Fact: {{hyperlink}} is the {{ordinalNum}} most recent music video to receive a PAK (Perfect All-Kill)!
fun.upcomingReleases: Fun Fact: '{{releaseName}}' ({{releaseType}}) by '{{artistName}}' is releasing soon on {{dateString}}!
fun.viewsByArtistType: Fun Fact: There is a combined total of {{totalViews}} views on all K-Pop music videos on YouTube, {{groupViews}} ({{groupProportion}}%) of which are from groups, while {{soloViews}} ({{soloProportion}}%) are from solo artists.
fun.viewsByGender: Fun Fact: There is a combined total of {{totalViews}} views on all K-Pop music videos on YouTube, {{maleViews}} ({{maleProportion}}%) of which are from male groups, {{femaleViews}} ({{femaleProportion}}%) from female groups, and the remaining {{coedViews}} ({{coedProportion}}%) from co-ed groups.
